utils.notFound: Babu bayanan da aka samo a wannan rukunin.

content.title: Vietopik - Koyi Koriya kyauta
content.learnKorean: Koyi Koriya tare da darussan masu inganci daga masana a ba da tsada.
content.learnFromExperts: Koya daga asalin masu magana da malamai.
content.learnAtYourOwnPace: Yi karatu a cikin hanzari tare da damar da ba a iyakance ba ga darussan.
content.coverAllAspects: Daga Mai farawa zuwa matakan ci gaba, rufe nahawu, ƙamus, da taɗi.

testimonial1.quote: "Vietopik ya taimake ni shirya don jarrabawar ta bayyana. Darussan suna da tsari da sauƙin bi!"
testimonial1.name: Nguyen Minh Anh Anh Anh Anh

testimonial2.quote: "Koyo Korean bai taba zama sauki ba! Darasi na tsari ya yi komai mai sauki da nishadi."
testimonial2.name: Tran Hai Nam

testimonial3.quote: "Godiya ga Vietofik, da kuma kwarewar magana da magana sun inganta sosai a cikin watanni uku kawai."
testimonial3.name: Le Thaid

content.yourOneStopShop: Platformaya na tsayawa na tsoratarwa na Koriya. Samun damar samar da kayayyaki don kyauta kuma cimma burin ku a yau!

metadata.lesson: Bincika darussan sabon darussan mu kuma nemo wani abu zaka kauna.
